body:
Comment 1 by **mizipzor**: 
To make the script work as expected you need to update to GNU Awk 3.1.6 (which can be 
downloaded from http://sourceforge.net/projects/gnuwin32/files/gawk/3.1.6-1/gawk-
3.1.6-1-bin.zip/download), it gives the following output:

// Assembly constants.
// AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY mkasmh.sh DURING BUILD

#define	get_tls(r)	MOVL 0x2c(FS), r
#define	g(r)	0(r)
#define	m(r)	4(r)

#define gobuf_sp 0
#define gobuf_pc 4
#define gobuf_g 8
#define g_stackguard 0
#define g_stackbase 4
#define g_defer 8
#define g_panic 12
#define g_sched 16
#define g_stack0 28
#define g_entry 32
#define g_alllink 36
#define g_param 40
#define g_status 44
#define g_goid 48
#define g_selgen 52
#define g_schedlink 56
#define g_readyonstop 60
#define g_ispanic 61
#define g_m 64
#define g_lockedm 68
#define g_sig 72
#define g_sigcode0 76
#define g_sigcode1 80
#define m_g0 0
#define m_morepc 4
#define m_morefp 8
#define m_morebuf 12
#define m_moreframe 24
#define m_moreargs 28
#define m_cret 32
#define m_procid 36
#define m_gsignal 44
#define m_tls 48
#define m_sched 80
#define m_curg 92
#define m_id 96
#define m_mallocing 100
#define m_gcing 104
#define m_locks 108
#define m_nomemprof 112
#define m_waitnextg 116
#define m_havenextg 120
#define m_nextg 132
#define m_alllink 136
#define m_schedlink 140
#define m_machport 144
#define m_mcache 148
#define m_lockedg 152
#define m_freg 156
#define m_return_address 220
#define m_stack_pointer 224
#define m_os_stack_pointer 228
